name: Box

props.name: background
props.description: Background colour override. When set to a theme tone (primary/secondary/tertiary), text colour is derived automatically.

props.name: fullWidth
props.description: Stretch to 100% width of the parent container

props.name: pad
props.description: Container padding. Numbers map via theme.spacing(n); strings pass through (e.g., "12px").

bestPractices: Use `Box` as a neutral container for background, padding, and width anchoring. Compose layout with `Stack` / `Grid` ; keep   `Surface` for page-level backgrounds.
Prefer theme tones ( `primary` / `secondary` / `tertiary` ) to get automatic text contrast. When using custom colours, set `textColor` to maintain accessibility.
Reach for `Panel` when you need outlines or separators.   `Box` stays minimal and opinionated so the theme can do the heavy lifting.
Reuse styles with `preset` via `definePreset()` instead of sprinkling inline styles.
